definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dubious word; si vera 1. appar. = shut in, enclose (Targum [[קְטַר]] Syr. qt.ar bind, qet.r0 chain);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. pl. [[חֲחֵדוֹת]] [[קְטֻרוֹת]] Ez Eze 46:22 enclosed courts (cf. interpr. in Levy:NHWB, and qat.iyre0 PS:3589), but rd. prob. [[קְטַגּוֹת]] small, LXX SyrVer Co Toy Berthol Krae.
